text: (Is faisle ke baad) woh log jinhon ne kufr kiya tha jahannum ki taraf giroh dar giroh haanke jayenge, yahan tak ke jab woh wahan pahunchenge to uske darwaze kholay jayenge aur uske kaarinde (keepers) unsey kahenge “kya tumhare paas tumhare apne logon mein se aisey Rasool nahin aaye thay, jinhon ne tumko tumhare Rubb ki aayat sunayi hon aur tumhein us baat se daraya ho ke ek waqt tumhein yeh din bhi dekhna hoga?” Woh jawab dengey “haan, aaye thay , magar azaab ka faisla kaafiron par chipak gaya”
